column5: Two of us will be the only guests on Little Vermilion Lake for the October 4 week. Life will be good to us. I wasn't sure a float plane ride would be available for us until I saw the sign. Have faith. Look for your sign.
Thats cool.  Have a fun time.
Brett changed the sign  "Moose Hunt Soon"  Be safe my friend!
Will be headed home by the time guns come out.   If not, I'll be wearing plenty of orange.
Enjoy! I gotta get up there again soon!
